text: test Halper24americaRunOutOfPower Utility forecasts for new US electricity demand have now doubled by 2030, and utilities point to AI that require “exponentially more power than traditional data centers,” as one major cause, threatening all the electrification needed for the Clean Power Transition, delaying coal plant shutdown, and encouraging small nuclear. Data center usage: • 2020: 4% • 2026: 6% Helpful AI use cases • speeding up plant approval pricess (Microsoft) • helping grid operate eﬀiciently • maybe microgrids, since these are getting forced by increased demand? Images missed in html and pdf capture: 123
